body_html:
Okay. So to make it work, the two Variables that you pass into the loss function must be of the same type, ie,
loss = nn.HingeEmbeddingLoss(2.0)(distance, Variable(torch.FloatTensor([1])))

The error message you received should definitely be improved, as well as our documentation for this.
body_text:

loss = nn.HingeEmbeddingLoss(2.0)(distance, Variable(torch.FloatTensor([1])))
The error message you received should definitely be improved, as well as our documentation for this.
body:
Okay. So to make it work, the two Variables that you pass into the loss function must be of the same type, ie,
`loss = nn.HingeEmbeddingLoss(2.0)(distance, Variable(torch.FloatTensor([1])))`

The error message you received should definitely be improved, as well as our documentation for this.
